thread.title: Reps. Lee Zeldin, Thomas Suozzi hosting town halls Thursday
thread.title_full: Reps. Lee Zeldin, Thomas Suozzi hosting town halls Thursday | Newsday

author: Laura Figueroa
title: Reps. Lee Zeldin, Thomas Suozzi hosting town halls Thursday
text:
Reps. Lee Zeldin (R-Shirley), left, and Thomas Suozzi (D-Glen Cove) will host town hall meetings on Thursday, Feb. 23, 2017. Zeldin will hold his via teleconference and Suozzi will speak in person at a forum in Plainview. (Credit: Ed Betz; Evelyn Hockstein) 

Two Long Island congressmen will host town hall meetings Thursday night — one by telephone and one face-to-face with constituents.
Rep. Lee Zeldin (R-Shirley) will take questions from residents in his East End district via a 7 p.m. teleconference — foregoing the traditional in-person town hall meetings hosted by other GOP lawmakers across the country that have drawn rowdy protesters condemning...
